counterfactuals.change: Do not fund Thermalist unless lock is durable
Use one extra high-adjacency city line in final action cycle
Play direct TR card instead of selling in final generation

key_turning_points.title: Rush line did not close by first global max

rule_updates: If award lock confidence is not high, do not fund it even when tempo feels good.
If first global maxes and finish is not imminent, pivot immediately to VP floor lanes.
In final generation, convert MC to immediate VP before passing whenever legal.

counterfactuals.change: Contest Builder earlier or force opponent off milestone line
Start city-card VP pivot by Gen 6 once rush closure is uncertain
Reduce negative/low-ceiling card mix and increase direct VP density

key_turning_points.title: Failed to add second scalable VP engine early
Game pace drifted to full-length engine game

rule_updates: If projected finish is Gen 11 or later by Gen 4, stop single-lane rush and add a second VP engine.
Track opponent card VP ceiling by Gen 6 and pivot if projection exceeds 35 VP.
Treat discount stack completion as a strategic alarm to deny or accelerate closure immediately.

tool_mismatches.actual: Timed out, but action had already executed server-side
tool_mismatches.expected: Sell patents action should return immediately
tool_mismatches.mitigation: After timeout, always poll game state before retrying to avoid duplicate actions.

tool_mismatches.actual: Server rejected without nested space payload
tool_mismatches.expected: Selecting option index should complete greenery placement
tool_mismatches.mitigation: For `or` with `space` branch, always include `sub_response_json` with `type=space` and `spaceId`.
